issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently, Hive is mostly using user-defined black box sql operators during Query planning. It will be more beneficial to use proper calcite operators, this is to prepare the ground for pushing complex expressions to Druid-calcite adapter.
fields.summary: Use proper Calcite operator instead of UDFs
